00058 #define XN_INFINITE   (0)
00059 #define XN_NONBLOCK   ((xnticks_t)-1)
00060 
00061 #define XN_APERIODIC_TICK  0
00062 #define XN_NO_TICK         ((xnticks_t)-1)
00063 
00064 #define testbits(flags,mask) ((flags) & (mask))
00065 #define setbits(flags,mask)  xnarch_atomic_set_mask(&(flags),mask)
00066 #define clrbits(flags,mask)  xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(&(flags),mask)
00067 #define __testbits(flags,mask) testbits(flags,mask)
00068 #define __setbits(flags,mask)  do { (flags) |= (mask); } while(0)
00069 #define __clrbits(flags,mask)  do { (flags) &= ~(mask); } while(0)
00070 
00071 typedef atomic_flags_t xnflags_t;
00072 
00073 #ifndef NULL
00074 #define NULL 0
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 #define XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN 32
00078 
00079 #define xnobject_copy_name(dst, src) \
00080 do { \
00081     if (src) \
00082         strncpy(dst, src, XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN); \
00083     else \
00084         *dst = '\0'; \
00085 } while (0)
00086 
00087 #define xnobject_create_name(dst, n, obj) \
00088     snprintf(dst, n, "%p", obj)
00089 
00090 #define minval(a,b) ((a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))
00091 #define maxval(a,b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))
00092 
00093 #if !defined(__KERNEL__) && !defined(BITS_PER_LONG)
00094 #include <stdint.h>
00095 #define BITS_PER_LONG __WORDSIZE

00112 #define xnpod_fatal(format,args...) \
00113 do { \
00114    const char *panic = xnpod_fatal_helper(format,##args); \
00115    xnarch_halt(panic); \
00116 } while (0)
00117 
00118 #define root_thread_init __xeno_user_init
